fields.name: Initial_Message
fields.fieldText: Communications can be sent from only selected list view on Premise tab.

fields.name: SPEN_FlowFinish
fields.fieldText: Click finish to end the flow

fields.name: SPEN_DisplayGoNextonDisplayScreen
fields.fieldText: Click next to move forward

validationRule.errorMessage: Kindly validate input value as it contains two consecutive "X", "[" or "]".
validationRule.formulaExpression: NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "XX")) && NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "xX")) && NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "Xx")) && NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "xx")) && NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "[")) && NOT(CONTAINS({!SPEN_DisplaySMSTemplate}, "]"))

validationRule.errorMessage: Kindly validate input value as it contains two consecutive "X", "[" or "]".

fields.name: SPEN_DisplayGoNextonButtonScreen
fields.fieldText: Click next to move forward

validationRule.errorMessage: Both Checkbox can't be true at a time

fields.name: SPEN_DateTimeforScheduleSMSCommunication
fields.fieldText: Date Time for Schedule SMS Communication

validationRule.errorMessage: Scheduled date and time can't be equal or older than current date and time
Both Voice Alert communication checkbox can't be true at a time

fields.name: SPEN_DateTimeforScheduleVoiceAlertCommunication
fields.fieldText: Date Time for Schedule Voice Alert Communication

validationRule.errorMessage: Scheduled date and time can't be equal or older than current date and time

fields.name: SPEN_NextMoveInfoHeader
fields.fieldText: Click next to move forward
